## [Account](account.proto.md#account) - Account info service.

>  Account info service.


* [GetInfo (/account/info/{id})](account.proto.md#getinfo) - Get account info.


* [GetInfos (/account/infos)](account.proto.md#getinfos) - Get account infos.


* [UpdateInfo (/account/info)](account.proto.md#updateinfo) - Update account info.




## [Auth](auth.proto.md#auth) - Authentication service.

>  Authentication service.


* [GetCode (/account/auth/code)](auth.proto.md#getcode) - Get auth code.


* [Login (/account/auth/login)](auth.proto.md#login) - Login.


* [OAuth (/account/auth/oauth)](auth.proto.md#oauth) - OAuth.


* [GetRegions (/account/auth/regions)](auth.proto.md#getregions) - Get regions.


* [Refresh (/account/auth/refresh)](auth.proto.md#refresh) - Refresh account token.




## [Bind](bind.proto.md#bind) - Account bind service.

>  Account bind service.


* [Apply (/account/bind)](bind.proto.md#apply) - Apply account bind.


* [Cancel (/account/bind)](bind.proto.md#cancel) - Cancel account bind.


* [Gets (/account/binds)](bind.proto.md#gets) - Get all bind info.

* [GetSecretInfo (/account/inner/secret/info)](inner_secret.proto.md#getsecretinfo) - Get token info.




## [Password](password.proto.md#password) - Account password service.

>  Account password service.


* [Set (/account/password)](password.proto.md#set) - Set account password.


* [Update (/account/password)](password.proto.md#update) - Update account password.


* [Reset (/account/password)](password.proto.md#reset) - Reset account password.




## [Profile](profile.proto.md#profile) - Account profile service.

>  Account profile service.


* [Set (/account/profile/{name})](profile.proto.md#set) - Set or update account profile.


* [Get (/account/profile/{name})](profile.proto.md#get) - Get account profile.
